markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 11"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Fiendish Teleportation](/Equipment.aspx?ID=760)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />
<trait label="Contract" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=329" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Legends](/Sources.aspx?ID=40) pg. 10</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

You tap into the fiendish ability to slip through space. When you Stride, you gain a +3 item bonus to Armor Class against reactions triggered by your movement. Once per day, from any distance, Abrogail Thrune II can call on a provision in your Thrune contract as a single action, causing you to become [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28) for 1 hour or until Abrogail releases you, whichever comes first.

<document level="2" id="action-602" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Fiendish Teleportation
